content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Nesibe, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a comfortable and convenient place to live. Let's discuss the rental price. How much were you considering to pay?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you, Mister Heine. I was thinking of a price that reflects the size and location of the apartment. Since it's 25 square meters, I would like to propose a fair price that works for both of us. How about 600 Euros per month?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Nesibe, your proposal of 600 Euros per month seems reasonable considering the size and location of the apartment. However, I'm looking to maximize the value for my property. Would you be willing to increase your offer slightly?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your position, Mister Heine. I'm also looking to get the best deal for my needs. How about we meet in the middle? 650 Euros per month would be a fair compromise, in my opinion. What do you think?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Nesibe, your counteroffer of 650 Euros per month is quite fair. It seems you're also interested in reaching a mutually beneficial agreement. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Would you be willing to go a bit higher? Perhaps 700 Euros per month? This would still be a good deal for you, considering the amenities and location of the apartment.
name: Heinrich Heine
